ABt.caption: Paddle Deployment
ABt.doc: The Sandbox Mode let you test in a secure environment. It does not use real payment. (You need a Paddle sandbox account to use it)
ABt.name: mode

ABu.caption: Display Theme
ABu.doc: Theme used to display the Checkout elements
ABu.name: display_theme

ABv.caption: Display Mode
ABv.doc: How to present the form. Overlay is like a Popup, Inline is within the Element.
ABv.name: display_method

ABx.caption: Disable Logout
ABx.doc: If yes, the user will not have the option to change its email address.
ABx.name: disable_logout

ABy.caption: Prefill Email
ABy.doc: Enter an email address to skip the first section of the Checkout
ABy.name: prefill_email

ABz.caption: Language
ABz.doc: Paddle Language code, example : French = fr , english = en , ...(please look at Paddle documentation)
ABz.name: locale

ACR.caption: Enable Tax ID
ACR.doc: Whether the option to add a tax number is displayed at checkout
ACR.name: showaddtaxid

ACS.caption: Enable Discounts
ACS.doc: Whether the option to add a discount is displayed at checkout.
ACS.name: showadddiscounts
